entry.title: 东周列国志
entry.content:
东周列国志

(明)冯梦龙 (清)蔡元放

故事从周幽王烽火戏诸侯开始到秦王扫六合结束，非常适合拿来说书。白话文读起来毫无压力，内容生动有趣。

Brief

Stories about East Zhou dynasty.It’s a book that suitable for PingShu performance.The story begins with Emperor You of Zhou lighting beacon fires to fool the feudal lords and ends with the uprising led by Chen Sheng and Wu Guang.
entry.summary:
东周列国志

(明)冯梦龙 (清)蔡元放

entry.title: 论自由
entry.content:
On Liberty

John Stuart Mill著 孟凡礼译

权力，自由，界限，群己权界，政府和个人的关系，这本书做出了很好的解释。某些观点即使今日依然适用。

Brief

The relationship about personal and the government.The definition of”Liberty” and some shining thinking still operates well in 21st century.
entry.summary:
On Liberty

John Stuart Mill著 孟凡礼译

entry.title: 严复传
entry.content:
严复传

王樥著

由他人整理的严复生平传记。记录了严复的生平事迹和思想见识，作为著名的翻译家，严复在近代思想启蒙方面的贡献不可磨灭。

Brief

A biology of Yan Fu,contains his entire life and deep thinking.This book still have some bright ideas and give people instrction to future.

entry.title: 丧钟为谁而鸣
entry.content:
For Whom The Bill Tolls

Ernest Hemingway著

以西班牙内战为蓝本创作的小说。丧钟为每一个独裁者和沉默的羔羊而鸣。

Brief

For Whom the Bell Tolls is a novel about the Spanish Civil War of the 1930s. It follows Robert Jordan, an American fighting for the leftist Republicans against the Fascist Nationalists. His goal is to blow up a bridge. Along the way, he finds love with Maria.

entry.title: 一滴泪
entry.content:
一滴泪 - 从肃反到文革的回忆

巫宁坤、李怡楷著

归国才子文革二十年的风雨历程,记录了动荡年代社会生活的各方面真实情况。

Brief

A sorrow and pain experience about a young professor have beard during the twenty years since he returned to his home country.The brilliance of family affection and humanity can always resonates with people.
entry.summary:
一滴泪 - 从肃反到文革的回忆

巫宁坤、李怡楷著
